    • compareResponseJSON

      public static Boolean compareResponseJSON(String strReqJSON, List<String> ExpectedKey, String strExpectedVal) throws org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
      Compares an attribute value in the response and the actual expected value.
      Parameters:
      strReqJSON - [String] : Request JSON
      ExpectedKey - [List of String] : Complete path of the attribute under consideration *
      strExpectedVal - [String] : Expected value of the attribute
      Returns:
      [Boolean] True if expected and actual values of the attribute match.
      Throws:
      org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - : Unparseable document

    • updateRequestJSON

      public static String updateRequestJSON(String strOrgParams, List<String> list, String strValFromExcel) throws org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
      Updates a Request JSON for the stated attribute with a different value
      Parameters:
      strOrgParams - [String] : Request JSON
      list - [List of String] : Complete path of the attribute under consideration *
      strValFromExcel - [String] : Expected value of the attribute
      Returns:
      [String] Updated JSON in String format.
      Throws:
      org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - : Unparseable document

    • extractxPathFromHeaderCellValue

      public List<String> extractxPathFromHeaderCellValue(String strCompletexPath)
      Extracts xPath attributes from a complete path separated by '.' [for eg: data.form.compliance}
      Parameters:
      strCompletexPath - [String] : Header Cell value
      Returns:
      [List of String] XPath attributes extracted into a list.
